content: this lovely floaty scarf features a delicate shell pattern that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit with clear and concise written instructions you ll enjoy a seamless crafting experience from start to finish the one-size design ensures a perfect fit for all making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe crochet this scarf using the luxurious juniper moon farm iris yarn known for its softness and drape providing a cozy yet lightweight feel whether you re treating yourself or gifting to a fellow crochet enthusiast the twilight haze scarf is sure to impress with its delicate lace design and timeless appeal **unique features-** advanced beginner-friendly pattern luxurious juniper moon farm iris yarn for a soft and drapey finish intricate shell pattern adds elegance to any outfit right and left-handed video tutorials for the full pattern included **materials needed-** us-l 8 0mm hook **lykke** https //knittingfever com/accessories/hooks-and-needles#toolline-bl 415 yds **juniper moon farm iris** https //knittingfever com/juniper-moon-farm/yarn/k-jmiris# 4/medium 437 yds 1 skein **stitch markers** https //amzn to/4jyp8v0
